item.title: Think! About Your Work
item.description: I recently re-discovered “The Pragmatic Programmer”. I remember reading this as an early software engineer and being really motivated to step up my game. The copy I have was published in 2000 and so reading it now there are some parts that seem a little dated; you can tell the internet was a young thing. However overall it is full to overflowing with good advice and solid suggestions. I thought I might go through the first handful of ‘tips’ (there are 70 in total) and eek out my thoughts around them and see if there are some new things to learn or to re-learn.

item.title: Care About Your Craft
item.description: Part 1 in a series on “The Pragmatic Programmer”. Do you care for your craft? Have you lost your motivation? Lets see if we can learn from those who have gone before us
